sentence.Network_en: Never dry underwear over direct heat; it will weaken the fabric.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要直接加热烘干内衣，那样会损坏布料。

sentence.Network_en: The Bundesbank's seemingly impregnable position has begun to weaken.
sentence.Network_cn: 德意志联邦银行看似不可撼动的地位开始削弱了。

sentence.Network_en: You can weaken the tea by adding water.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以加水把茶弄得淡一些.

entry.def: If you weaken something or if it weakens, it becomes less strong or less powerful.

example.ex: The recession has weakened so many firms that many can no longer survive...
example.tran: 经济衰退使许多公司实力大损，不少难以为继。

example.ex: The Prime Minister's opponents believe that her authority has been fatally weakened...
example.tran: 首相的反对者认为她的权威已经受到致命削弱。

entry.def: If your resolve weakens or if something weakens it, you become less determined or less certain about taking a particular course of action that you had previously decided to take.

example.ex: I looked at the list and felt my resolve weakening...
example.tran: 我看着名单，觉得自己的决心正在动摇。
詹妮的态度有所缓和，最终软了下来。

entry.def: If something weakens you, it causes you to lose some of your physical strength.

example.tran: 营养不良明显导致病人身体虚弱。

entry.def: If something weakens an object, it does something to it which causes it to become less firm and more likely to break.

example.ex: A bomb blast had weakened an area of brick on the back wall...
example.tran: 一颗炸弹爆炸使后墙的一片砖发生了松动。

example.ex: Never dry underwear over direct heat; it will weaken the fabric.
example.tran: 不要直接加热烘干内衣，那样会损坏布料。

auth_sentence.content: It also may weaken the immune system or trigger inflammation.

auth_sentence.content: Should the economy weaken, students could continue trading down.
auth_sentence.res_content: Should the economy weaken, students could continue trading down.

auth_sentence.content: But Russia fears the system will weaken its nuclear deterrent.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Russia fears the system will weaken its nuclear deterrent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Russia fears the system will weaken its nuclear deterrent.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: In the long run, the Depression weakened American families, and the current crisis will probably do the same.
It will gradually weaken the eyes of adults.
For instance, some people believe that wearing glasses too soon weakens the eyes.
Generous parental leave policies and readily available part-time options have unintended consequences:instead of strengthening women's attachment to the workplace,they appear to weaken it.
He felt troubled about the weakening of American craftsmanship.
Inevitably however, the day came when she was so weakened that she had to return to Pittsburgh, her home town.

sentences.en: She weakened as the illness grew worse.
sentences.cn: 由于病情恶化, 她变得更虚弱了。

sentences.en: You can weaken the tea by adding water.
sentences.cn: 你可以加水把茶弄得淡一些。

jushi.english: They have not yet agreed to our requests but they are clearly weakening.
jushi.chinese: 他们还没有同意我们的要求,但态度已明显软化。
